favourite.article: Gellert was a German poet. Born in Saxony, the son of a Lutheran pastor, he studied at the University of Leipzig, but his temperament was not suited to preaching. He became a teacher at the university. Many of his poems have an instructional tendency. - Songs of the Spirit by Martin -------------------- the original last stanza says: Jesus lives! to Him the throne over all the world is given: may we go where He has gone, rest and reign with Him in heaven. Hallelujah!
